name: HellHeim Pinball
description:
This Game is a pinball game that is in a cool icy Aesthetic. It was made as part of a team project for school at Aie Academy of Interactive Entertainment. 

The creators are 

Programmers: Terrick, Brittnie, Cade 

Artist: Patrick, Bre, Josh

Designers: Terrick

Controls: A or Left click ~ Left Flipper

Controls: D or Right click ~ Right Flipper

Controls: Space~ Charge Launcher/Plunger
